classScheduleInformation: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: ARTS 280.
description: Continuation of ARTS 280. Explores the relationship of sculptural materials and media to meaning; research into the historical, contemporary, and contextual semiotics of materials in order to generate meaning. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 6 hours. Prerequisite: ARTS 280.
label: Sculpture II
sectionFeeAmount: Undergrad Sculpture A D $50.00 Flat Fee.
